sentences.en: As an ultimate sanction, they can sell their shares.
sentences.cn: 作为最高的处罚，他们可以出售他们的股份。

sentences.en: Ballet is the ultimate in human movement.
sentences.cn: 芭蕾舞在人类的动作中可谓优雅至极。

sentences.en: Caviar and oysters on ice are generally considered the ultimate luxury foods.
sentences.cn: 一般认为，鱼子酱和冰镇牡蛎是顶级美味。

sentences.en: Coleman lives in fear of the ultimate disgrace.
sentences.cn: 科尔曼整天担心会颜面尽失。

sentences.en: Complete disarmament was the ultimate goal of the conference.
sentences.cn: 全面裁军是这次会议的最终目标。

sentences.en: Computer games are the ultimate anorak pursuit.
sentences.cn: 电脑游戏是电脑迷的大爱。

sentences.en: For me, spaghetti bolognese is the ultimate comfort food.
sentences.cn: 意大利肉酱面是绝好的安慰食物。

sentences.en: He was the ultimate arbiter on both theological and political matters.
sentences.cn: 他在神学和政治事务上都是最终的仲裁人。

sentences.en: His ultimate aim is to demerge the group.
sentences.cn: 他的最终目的是要拆分这个集团。

sentences.en: Of course, the ultimate authority remained the presidency.
sentences.cn: 当然，拥有最高权力者依然是总统。

sentences.en: Such arguments ignore the question of where ultimate responsibility lay.
sentences.cn: 这些争论忽略了最终责任由谁来负的问题。

sentences.en: The ultimate aim is to expand the network further.
sentences.cn: 最终目的是为了进一步拓展该网络。

sentences.en: The ultimate outcome of the experiment cannot be predicted.
sentences.cn: 试验的最后结果无法预测。

sentences.en: the ultimate truths of philosophy and science
sentences.cn: 哲学与科学的终极原理

sentences.en: Their ultimate aim was a market economy for Hungary.
sentences.cn: 他们最终的目标是为匈牙利建立起市场经济体制。

sentences.en: This hotel is the ultimate in luxury.

sentences.cn: 背叛是最不可饶恕的罪孽。

sentences.en: Working from home offers the ultimate in flexible life styles.
sentences.cn: 在家办公为人们提供了极其灵活的生活方式。

words.tran_cn: 最后通牒；最后结论；基本原理

phrases.tran_cn: 极限承载力，极限承载量；轴承极限能力，承载量
[电]极限容量；[电]总功率；最终产量
末级消费者；最后消费者
极限状态；最大极限状态
极限输出；极限输出功率；极限容量，最大功率

trans.tran_cn: 最后的，极限的，首要的，最大的
trans.tran_en: someone’s ultimate aim is their main and most important aim, that they hope to achieve in the future

trans.tran_cn: 终极，顶点，基本原理，基本事实
trans.tran_en: the best or most modern example of something
